/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and white, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a few scattered clouds. The street below is a hive of activity, lined with trees that provide a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the city's preferred modes of transport. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
